name: css-flex-grow
description: Css module of single purpose classes for flex grow

scripts.start: tachyons src/css-flex-grow.css > css/css-flex-grow.css && tachyons src/css-flex-grow.css --minify > css/css-flex-grow.min.css && tachyons src/css-flex-grow.css --generate-docs --package=../../package.json > readme.md
